Interface AppProvider

All Superinterfaces:
LifeCycle
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContextProvider, BundleContextProvider, BundleWebAppProvider, ContextProvider, ScanningAppProvider
public interface AppProvider extends LifeCycle
Object responsible for providing Apps to the DeploymentManager
